{{also|party|p√°rty}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|en|party}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|de|De-at-Party.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Partys}} # {{lb|de|colloquial}} [[party]] {{gloss|social gathering}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|s}} ====Usage notes==== * The plural ''{{l|de|Parties}}'' is now proscribed, but still in use. ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|Feier}}, {{l|de|Fest}}, {{l|de|Fete}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Partyband}} * {{l|de|Abrissparty}} * {{l|de|Hausparty}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
